message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $14,000. I think this is a great price considering the value it will bring to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested, but I'm hoping we can find a price that works better for both of us. I'd be willing to pay $13,500 for the product. What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for the counteroffer! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $13,800. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
